text: Emomali Rahmon (; born 5 October 1952) is a Tajikistani politician. He has served as President of Tajikistan (or its equivalent post) since 1992. His rule is commonly regarded as a dictatorship. During the early years of his presidency, Rahmon faced a civil war in which up to 100,000 people died. In 2013, he was elected to a fourth term in office. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Tajikistan Category:Current national leaders Category:Dictators
title: Emomali Rahmon
